sentences.sContent: He had a strong Irish accent
sentences.sCn: 他有浓重的爱尔兰口音。

synos.tran: 口音；[语]重音；强调；特点；重音符号

words.tran: 重音的；根据重音定节奏的；有抑扬的
重读；强调；增强；加重音符号

trans.tranCn: 口音；重音；强调；特点；重音符号
trans.tranOther: the way someone pronounces the words of a language, showing which country or which part of a country they come from
to make something more noticeable so that people will pay attention to it
